titles.title: Probation Officers' Protection Act of 2000
To amend title 18, United States Code, with respect to the authority of probation officers and pretrial services officers to carry firearms.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Crime.

bill.summary: 5/11/2000--Introduced. Probation Officers' Protection Act of 2000 - Amends the Federal criminal code to authorize probation officers and pretrial services officers to carry firearms upon satisfactorily completing safety and proficiency training or testing prescribed by the Director of the Administrative Office of the United States Courts.
